A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is one of the best Star Wars movies ever created.  It takes several of the themes so entrenched within Star Wars legacy\, yet offers a transition and a new line - essentially\, it is Star Wars and \"not Stars Wars\" in one wonderful orchestrated bundle.  Full of excited and poignant social messages\, this is an excellent continuation of the series.  Mark Hamill delivers an great performance - flowing with the shocking turn and restoration of the fan-favorite character\, Luke Skywalker.  With the assortment of various storylines coming together\, this installment of the franchise offers an array of emotional tuggings\, from the hopeless to the inspirational...
